title: Investigate the Murders
content:
terfly on Skull, and press the button to reveal the entrance.

Father Lorgan (Deceased): In the infirmary of the Open Hand Temple. Duke Belynne Stelmane (Deceased): Upper floor of the Elfsong Tavern. Alexander Rainforest (Deceased): In a bed on the top floor of Rainforest's Home. Franc Peartree (Deceased): On the ground in Peartree's Home. Cora Highberry (alive): Found at The Wine Festival. Figaro Pennygood (alive): Inside Facemaker's Boutique. Chef Roveer (alive).: In the kitchen of the Elfsong
